import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { timeSince } from "./createdTime"; import { formatNumber } from "./CountFormat"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Room = ({ room, index }) => { console.log(room.id); return (
@{room.host.username}
{timeSince(room.created)}
{room.name}

{room.description}

{formatNumber(room.participants.length)} Joined

{room.topic.name}

); }; export default Room;
